answers.answer: Thanks Purple, for that update.I didn't know that he had Type 1.  It is wonderful that people with type1, with the right tools and knowledge can live long and full lives.I follow Dr. Bernstein.  He is currently 83, type 1 medical Doctor, still practicing, doing lectures, wiping the floor with younger people at the gym, etc.

question: I just read that comedian Jerry Lewis passed away today at 91 of natural causes- you may or may not know this, but he had Type 1 diabetes.  It's so sad that he passed, but isn't it awesome to see that someone with type 1 lived a long and I'd venture to say full life?  Just wanted to post about him as a little encouragement that your type 1 diagnosis isn't the end of your life- it's a complication you have to manage, but you can do it!RIP Jerry
title: Jerry Lewis passes away at 91
